semantics.label: Player mode
semantics.description: Select the layout of the player.

semantics.label: Enable controls
semantics.description: Controls allow the user to for instance pause the audio

semantics.label: Enable autoplay
semantics.description: With autoplay the audio starts to play immediately. If autoplay is disabled the user presses a play button to start the audio.

semantics.label: Pause audio (Readspeaker)
semantics.default: ផ្អាកសម្លេង

semantics.label: Audio not supported message
semantics.default: កម្មវិធីបើកវេបសាយរបស់អ្នកមិនអាចបើកឯកសារសម្លេងនេះទេ
